common_issues.title: Pieces OS Update and Feature Bugs
common_issues.description: Users report issues with Pieces OS updates failing on Windows, and features like "Secret Message" not working as expected on macOS. Solutions include updating App Installer on Windows and investigating potential compatibility issues with M3 Macs for the "Secret Message" feature.

related_issues.title: Pieces OS Update fails
related_issues.text:
Pieces OS Update fails
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

The notification popped up saying an update was available so I clicked Update and a few seconds later got this message box:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b14dc8ab-632a-4095-b45b-7bbaba3c70ce)

This is on a very fresh Windows 11 installation.
## GitHub Issue Conversation Summary

**Key Points:**

* User ThatRendle reported an issue with PiecesOS failing to launch on Windows.
* The issue is likely caused by a bug in the App Installer technology used by Windows.
* User bejokun reported the same issue and received a warning about a Trojan.

**Problems Identified:**

* PiecesOS fails to launch on Windows.
* User receives a Trojan warning when trying to launch PiecesOS manually.

**Solutions Proposed/Implemented:**

* Update App Installer through the Microsoft Store.
* Pieces support team is investigating the Trojan warning.

**Current Status/Outcome:**

* The issue with PiecesOS failing to launch is still being investigated.
* The origin of the Trojan warning is unknown.

**Additional Notes:**

* Pieces support team provided helpful resources for troubleshooting.
* The user confirmed that the issue occurs every time they try to launch PiecesOS.

Gemini 2.0 Flash did fail completely:
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/50735f7a-28a1-4563-b490-e10c271eca23)
## Summary of pieces-app/support issue #645

**Key points raised:**

* Users @hra42, @joelash, and @bartonfriedland are experiencing issues with PiecesOS running in "basic mode" due to device constraints.
* The issue manifests as the "secret message not working properly" and no updates/rollups of the agent.
* The users are all running M3 Macs with macOS 15.3.1.

**Problems identified:**

* The underlying cause of the "basic mode" issue is not fully understood.
* Users are unable to utilize the full functionality of PiecesOS due to the device constraints.

**Solutions proposed/implemented:**

* @mark-at-pieces suggested closing and opening PiecesOS to resolve the issue. 
* No further solutions were proposed or implemented within the conversation.

**Current status/outcome:**

* The issue remains unresolved, with multiple users experiencing the same problem on M3 Macs.
* Further investigation is needed to determine the root cause of the "basic mode" issue and develop a permanent solution.

**Additional notes:**

* @mark-at-pieces believes that the issue is related to the secret message functionality and the way it operates in "basic mode".

**Overall, the conversation highlights the need for further investigation and resolution of the "basic mode" issue affecting PiecesOS users on M3 Macs.**

Personal Domain backup

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.2.2

### Early Access Program

- [x] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I want to sync this PC to another PC，but i cann't backup the lastest data.
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/bfb4fb14-5e7f-45c7-828f-5f77f550453a)

this is another PC

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3c2d880e-a1b2-40c1-82b1-9935bffbf8fb)
## GitHub Issue Summary

**Key Points:**

* User laborer123 reported two issues:
    * Difficulty changing personal domain after copying `com.pieces.os` and `com.pieces.pfd` to a new PC.
    * Inability to back up their current computer and restore it to another new computer using their existing personal domain due to an error message.
* Support agent mark-at-pieces clarified the issues:
    * The personal domain was already registered.
    * User needs to attempt registering a new domain.
    * User needs to click a refresh icon to restore the data from a cloud backup.

**Solutions Proposed:**

* Register a new personal domain.
* Use the cloud backup by clicking the identified refresh icon to restore the data to the new PC.

**Implementation:**

* It's unclear whether the user implemented the proposed solutions.

**Outcome:**

* User acknowledged the explanation about registering a new domain.
* User expressed their desire to directly back up their current computer with the existing personal domain and create a new backup instead. They also mentioned facing issues with backing up.

**Current Status:**

* User requires assistance in understanding the direct backup and restore options.
* Support agent may need to further clarify the backup process and error resolution.

**Additional Notes:**

* The user provided screenshots illustrating their issue, however, these screenshots are not included in the provided conversation summary.

recommendations: **Prioritize 'Pieces OS Update and Feature Bugs'**: This issue cluster has the highest frequency (3) and includes critical bugs like update failures and feature malfunctions. Focus on resolving these issues to improve user experience and reduce support volume.

**Investigate Windows Update Compatibility**: The 'Pieces OS Update fails' issue suggests potential compatibility problems with the Windows App Installer. Investigate and address these issues to ensure smooth updates for Windows users.

**Address macOS 'Secret Message' Issue**: The 'Secret Message' feature is not working as expected on macOS, particularly on M3 Macs. Investigate potential compatibility issues and provide solutions or workarounds to address this problem.

**Improve Personal Domain Backup Clarity**: The 'Personal Domain backup' ticket highlights user confusion regarding backup and restore functionality. Improve documentation and in-app guidance for personal domain backup and restore to empower users and reduce support requests.

**Monitor and Address Ticket Activity**: Track ticket activity levels to identify and prioritize issues requiring immediate attention. Proactively engage with users facing issues on highly active tickets to ensure timely resolution and improve user satisfaction.
